name: DGCP | MaMeeFarm™ — Proof 404 | Morning Temperature Check
description:
This NFT documents the start of farm work at MaMeeFarm™ on
29 December 2025 at 06:26 (Asia/Bangkok).

The activity records an on-site environmental check using a physical temperature and humidity device, captured directly at the farm location before daily work begins.

Measured conditions:

Temperature: 16.7°C

Humidity: 72%

This record reflects real-world data captured without modification and serves as a verifiable proof under the DGCP (Data Governance & Continuous Proof) framework.
